Tunable.name: AVAILABLE_TOOLTIP_HEADER
Tunable.description: A string to be used as a header for a bulleted list of items that the Sim will consume in order to run this interaction.

Tunable.name: UNAVAILABLE_TOOLTIP_HEADER
Tunable.description: A string to be used as a header for a bulleted list of items that the Sim is missing in order to run this interaction.
